selected_quotes: Moving beyond the format wars of print vs digital books.
.@nickearls is answering YOUR questions now about the future of publishing 📖 Comment your Qs here
Catch @nickearls NOW on @abchobart as he chats with @helenshield about his latest #TheConversation piece.
What will an eBook be 20 years from now? What will a book be? #UQ's
Has the print book trumped digital? Beware of glib conclusions @ConversationEDU @nickearls

citation.abstract: Reports of the decline of the eBook are premature. The publishing industry is changing rapidly and data that appears robust tells us less than it once did.
citation.title: Has the print book trumped digital? Beware of glib conclusions
